sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Data">400bdcb3db58a010ae0428df4b96190f</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
	
	var grp = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
	grp.addQuery('name',source.u_support_team);
	grp.query();
	
	if(grp.next()){
		//target.support_team = grp.sys_id;
		log.info('Support Team: ' + source.u_support_team + ', ID: ' + grp.sys_id);
	}
	

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-12 08:08:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>73a7e4fbdb58a010ae0428df4b9619a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onForeignInsert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DROS" source="x_552094_dros">3fd330ebdbdc6010ae0428df4b961902</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DROS">3fd330ebdbdc6010ae0428df4b961902</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_73a7e4fbdb58a010ae0428df4b9619a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 08:27:09</sys_updated_on><when>onForeignInsert</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
